name: Joi
content:
Joi was a Human female smuggler who lived on the planet Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY, Joi resided in the city of Bestine on Tatooine. While here, she received a crate of a illicit goods from a smuggler working for Gotan.
Joi was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Joi was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
In the game, people who played as a smuggler might work for a person named Gotan, and deliver smuggled goods to various individuals, including Joi.
